title: A little vocab quiz
author: VD
content_html:
I knew 98 of the 100. I missed mitosis and orthography; no doubt the former will amuse Mr. Hatfield. I thought my notion of moiety would be wrong, but it turned out to be correct.

How did you do?
content_text:
I knew 98 of
the 100
.  I missed mitosis and orthography; no doubt the former will amuse Mr. Hatfield.  I thought my notion of moiety would be wrong, but it turned out to be correct.
How did you do?
